content: Thank you for sharing this. This photo is beautiful and makes me teary. It reminds me that many of us — artists especially — are striving to be our best, reaching for the skies, the perfection, the elusive “unknowns”. What’s powerful about this picture is that we are all ultimately connected, as seen through the tiny branches that are making their way out to connect with other branches. Beautiful. Stunning. Love this. Thank you so much. You made my morning!
